General.Name: Holcim Philippines Inc
General.Description: Holcim Philippines, Inc. manufactures, sells, distributes, and exports cement and cementitious products in the Philippines and internationally. It operates through two segments, Clinker and Cement, and Other Construction Materials and Services. The company offers Holcim 4X, an American Society for Testing and Materials (ASTM) C150 Portland cement for ready mix concrete applications; Holcim Premium cement, an ASTM type I Portland cement; Holcim Solido, an ASTM Type IP cement for roads and general concrete applications; Holcim Excel, an ASTM type IP cement for general concrete construction; and Holcim WallRight cement, an ASTM C91 type S Masonry cement for block laying, plastering, and finishing use. It also provides clinkers; SF Crete, a solution for one day concrete pavement; aggregates for various construction applications; Holcim Tile Adhesive, a cement-based adhesive for tiles; Holcim skim coat, a cementitious plaster for indoor and outdoor use; and Holcim Multifix, a polymer modified mortar for internal and external wall plastering, floor screed, and tile installation; Holcim Aqua X, a general-purpose cement; and Holcim Ecoplanet, a cement for structural applications. In addition, the company purchases, leases, and sells real estate properties; mines, processes, and sells quarry resources; manufactures, uses, and sells admixtures; and provides business process outsourcing and other information technology enabled services, as well as construction-related training, consultancy, testing, and other technical services. It offers its products to traders, wholesalers, retailers, contractors serving private and public projects, real estate developers, and concrete producers. The company was formerly known as Union Cement Corporation and changed its name to Holcim Philippines, Inc. in November 2004. The company was incorporated in 1964 and is headquartered in Taguig City, the Philippines. Holcim Philippines, Inc. is a subsidiary of Union Cement Holdings Corporation.
General.Address: Two World Square, Taguig City, Philippines, 1634
